SQL: select Ruleset, GameObjects.GameID, ObjectID from GameObjects inner join Games on Games.GameID = GameObjects.GameID
select Ruleset, GameObjects.GameID, ObjectID from GameObjects inner join Games on Games.GameID = GameObjects.GameID where GameObjects.Type = @ExtraData

select Ruleset, GameObjects.GameID, ObjectID from GameObjects inner join GamePlayers on GameObjects.PlayerObjectID = GamePlayers.PlayerObjectID inner join Games on Games.GameID = GameObjects.GameID where GamePlayers.IsLocal = 1

select Ruleset, GameObjects.GameID, ObjectID from GameObjects inner join GamePlayers on GameObjects.PlayerObjectID = GamePlayers.PlayerObjectID inner join Games on Games.GameID = GameObjects.GameID where GamePlayers.IsLocal = 1 and GameObjects.Type = @ExtraData

select Ruleset, GameObjects.GameID, ObjectID from GameObjects inner join GamePlayers on GameObjects.PlayerObjectID = GamePlayers.PlayerObjectID inner join Games on Games.GameID = GameObjects.GameID where GamePlayers.IsMajor = 1

select Ruleset, GameObjects.GameID, ObjectID from GameObjects inner join GamePlayers on GameObjects.PlayerObjectID = GamePlayers.PlayerObjectID inner join Games on Games.GameID = GameObjects.GameID where GamePlayers.IsMajor = 1 and GameObjects.Type = @ExtraData
select Ruleset, GameID as 'GameID', null as 'ObjectID' from Games

select Ruleset, GameObjects.GameID, GamePlayers.PlayerObjectID as ObjectID from GamePlayers inner join GameObjects on GamePlayers.PlayerObjectID = GameObjects.ObjectID inner join Games on GameObjects.GameID = Games.GameID

select Ruleset, GameObjects.GameID, GamePlayers.PlayerObjectID as ObjectID from GamePlayers inner join GameObjects on GamePlayers.PlayerObjectID = GameObjects.ObjectID inner join Games on GameObjects.GameID = Games.GameID where GamePlayers.IsMajor = 1

select Ruleset, GameObjects.GameID, GamePlayers.PlayerObjectID as ObjectID from GamePlayers inner join GameObjects on GamePlayers.PlayerObjectID = GameObjects.ObjectID inner join Games on GameObjects.GameID = Games.GameID where GamePlayers.IsLocal = 1
select Ruleset, null as 'GameID', null as 'ObjectID' from Rulesets
